articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Ukraine targets Russian soldiers accused of threatening nuclear plant - ABC News
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy warns Russian soldiers who shoot at Europe's largest nuclear power station or use it as a base will become a "special target" for Ukrainian forces.
articles.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has warned Russian soldiers who shoot at Europe's largest nuclear power station or use it as a base to shoot from that they will become a "special target" for … [+4170 chars]

articles.title: Amsterdam airport to compensate chaos-hit travellers - News24
articles.description: Amsterdam's Schiphol airport said it will compensate passengers who missed flights due to huge queues in a chaotic summer at one of Europe's busiest hubs.
articles.content:
The Hague, Aug 12, 2022 (AFP) -Amsterdam's Schiphol airport said it will compensate passengers who missed flights due to huge queues in a chaotic summer at one of Europe's busiest hubs.
